ã€€ã€€ç»¼ä¸Šæ‰€è¿°ï¼Œè¿˜åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ±‰å­—çš„äººï¼Œç´ è´¨å“å‘³ä¿®å…»åŸºæœ¬ä¸Šéƒ½å¾ˆä½ã€‚ ã€€ã€€ ã€€ã€€é™„ä¸Šè‹±æ–‡åŸç¨¿ï¼š ã€€ã€€ ã€€ã€€First thing to say is, you see the reason why this article is the Chinese characters, because I to take care of you, so you can read (It would be like to keep the animals understand one thing, you must tell the language of animals like them), I used the original Esperanto "English" written. In addition to Chinese characters, the rest of Asia such as Japan, South Korea, and so the national language of the text is also low, and sooner or later to be eliminated! ã€€ã€€At this time the quality of some of the people did not jump out shouting, what the essence of character is what the Chinese nation, crystal, spiritual, treasure ah so narcissistic to say, but also accused me of not qualified to be Chinese, descendants and so on ... ... These people, self-cultivation so low, which was originally on the "character" of the topic of discussion, they will attack those who turn to the discussion, personal attacks, no products! What these people say national pride, typical of Nazism, racism! Heard: ã€€ã€€We are a family love each other ã€€ã€€I'm with you heart to heart ã€€ã€€Live the global village ã€€ã€€We are family ã€€ã€€You and Me ã€€ã€€From one world ã€€ã€€We are family ã€€ã€€Come on, friend ã€€ã€€Together hand in hand ã€€ã€€Come on, love Together hand in hand ã€€ã€€You and me From one world Forever we are one family ã€€ã€€These people, narrow-minded, all day long complacent contentment in their own one-third of that acre of land, no bigger picture, world view, is a stumbling block to progress of all mankind! Cultivation of such high quality in our people's eyes, the world is one, as long as humans are brothers and sisters (my last resort here, brothers and sisters of those savage Remonstrance to home truths), we hope to early reunification of the language, because The different languages, will lead to poor communication, there will be disagreements, disputes, so that we can not unity and progress. ã€€ã€€"Chinese", each word is different, if you encounter a never learned the words, only the investigation, now mostly use the alphabet, never learned the word, do not know the pronunciation, you will not fight, can not start investigations. The English, by the twenty-six-letter, some never learned the words, according to learned can guess one or two, if they really will not, is also very easy to check, according to dipper gourd is painted. Chinese characters, is very unscientific, each word a separate faction, disorganized, and English, by the basic letters of each word (with hearts softened to say Chinese radicals formed by the strokes, the composition may be the way that the ever-changing, there is no law to follow, and English, composed of only one way: from left to right row), a simple comparison to see both a good or bad. Also insisted on the use of Chinese characters in this elusive, complex and does not accept this simple and easy to understand English, the text of the man of science can not explain their low taste it? ã€€ã€€In summary, people are still using Chinese characters, the quality of training is basically very low taste.
